location: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France
description: The Eiffel Tower is an iconic symbol of Paris, offering stunning views of the city. Visitors can enjoy dining, photo opportunities, and a rich history of this engineering marvel.
The Grand Canyon is a breathtaking natural wonder, carved by the Colorado River over millions of years. It's ideal for hiking, photography, and camping.
Machu Picchu is an ancient Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains. Known for its sophisticated dry-stone construction, it offers a glimpse into history and spectacular views.

fees: Free access, $20 to $50 for guided tours
description: Santorini is a picturesque island known for its white-washed buildings, blue domes, and stunning sunsets. It's a popular destination for couples and families alike.
The Great Wall of China is a historic fortification and a UNESCO World Heritage site. It offers an unforgettable journey through history and panoramic landscapes.
